description: Developed features full stack and worked on Google Web Server.
Worked on developing demos for customers using IBM Cloud tools.
The aim of this program is to help university students be more aware of what IBM does and help them get familiar with IBM Cloud.

Student assistant for CMPE160 - Introduction to Object Oriented Programming. Helping the teaching assistants in preparing quizzes and projects, grading homework and helping students during problem sessions.
Development of native Android and iOS applications. Component structure, unit and snapshot tests in iOS. Scrum methodology.
Development of native Android and iOS applications.
With the help of team members and websites like Udacity, I learned about Android Development and developed the Popular Movies project.
